description_info.description: Chandler and Joey are dining out at the Riff's. Both are frustrated by the absence of a waitress. Both mistakes Ursula for Pheobe. The two ask questions thinking that Ursula is Pheobe.
Joey and Chandler are waiting to order food at the Riff's
Pheobe's twin sister Ursula walks in after being called up by the two.

qa.question: Why are Chandler and Joey upset?
qa.answer: Because they couldn't find anyone to order food
qa.wrong_answer2: Because the staff memebers were very rude
qa.wrong_answer3: Because they didn't have any money
qa.wrong_answer4: Because there weren't enough seats available

qa.answer: 1. It's close to her place 2. The aprons were cute
qa.wrong_answer2: 1. Not many cutomers 2. Good tip money

description_info.description: Ross, Pheobe, Monica, and Rachel are in the Central Perk, sitting around the sofa. Ross is talking about his hardship in relations to his monkey. Joey and Chandler peek through the window of Central Perks from outside, discussing how similar Pheobe and Ursula look alike. The two walks into the cafe and talks to Pheobe about Ursula. Pheobe lets the gang know about her uneasy relationship with her twin sister. Ross ready himself to attend his parenting class. Ross expresses his uncomfortableness with the whole situation in regards to his wife and her partner by mistakenly putting on Monica's jacket.
The whole group gathers in on around the caf√©. Joey and Chandler tell the others about Ursula.
Ross shares his feelings on attending a Lamaze class

description_info.description: Ross, Susan, and Carol are at the Lamaze class with other expecting parents. The session begins with couples introducing themselves in a circle. When it is Ross' turn, he has a nervous breakdown and has trouble explaining his relationship complications.
Ross and his wife & her girlfriend are at a Lamaze class, sitting in a circle with other parents.
The three-membered group seems nervous about what others may think of them.

qa.question: How many children are the Rostins expecting?
Why does Ross stutter when it was his turn?
qa.answer: He was afraid people might not be so accepting of his situation.
qa.wrong_answer1: He wanted to act funny on purpose
qa.wrong_answer4: He wanted to go to the bathroom

qa.question: What is the husband's name of the first couple?

description_info.description: Chandler is in the office reading through reports. Helen, the secretary, buzzes to let him know that Nina is here. Chandler lets Nina in and discusses the mistake that she's made on the Friday's report. The two giggles with fun as Nina picks up the word Weenus.
Chandler is in his office doing his work
Nina comes into Chandler's office to discuss the mistakes she made.

qa.wrong_answer1: She was on the phone during work hours
qa.wrong_answer2: She was being loud in her office

description_info.description: Chandler, Ross, Pheobe, Monica, and Rachel are getting ready to eat their Chinese takeout food at Monica's apartment. Chandler expresses that he really likes Nina from work. Meanwhile, Marcel, the monkey, grabs hold of the TV remote and refuses to give it back to Ross. Eventually, Marcel changes the audio option to Spanish and Ross is not sure how to change it back to English. Joey walks in after visiting Riff's for the second time to go talk to Ursula. He is pleased that the feeling is mutual. Joey asks for Pheobe's permission to go out with Ursula and Pheobe reluctantly agrees.
Chandler, Ross, Pheobe, Monica, and Rachel are eating dinner at Monica's apartment.
Joey is very much into Ursula.

qa.question: Which language did Marcel change the TV settings to?
What extra food did Ursula give to Joey?
qa.answer: A tuna melt and 4 plates of curly fries
qa.wrong_answer1: A slice of Pizza and an avocado

description_info.description: Ross walks into his Lamaze classroom but only finds Susan. They decide to stay put and Susan flips a coin to have one of them fill in for Carol's place in a breathing exercise. As a result, Ross was chosen as the maternal role and Susan for the paternal role.
Susan and Ross meet up at the Lamaze class without Carol.
Ross takes the mother role while doing a breathing exercise.

description_info.description: Chandler is playing with his toy until Mr.D comes into the room. Chandler is then notified of the news that Nina is to be fired immediately. Then Nina is brought up to the office, however, Chandler fails to deliver the message as he was not used to such a role, asks Nina out on a date instead.
At the office, Chandler is put in a position to fire Nina
Chandler asks out Nina instead of firing her

description_info.description: Rachel, Chandler, and Monica are sitting around the table in Monica's apartment, while Pheobe is watching tv in the living room. Joey walks in with a gleeful cheer with a gift in his hands. Mr. Heckles comes up to complain about a noise. When Joey asks Pheobe to try on the sweaters he got for Ursula, her disdain towards her twin sister only grows deeper.

description_info.description: Chandler is kissing Nina in his office until Mr.D comes into the office to find out that Nina has not been laid off. Nina walks out of the office, complementing Mr.D's tie. Chandler makes up his excuse for not firing her, saying that Nina has suffered psychologically after receiving the news and that she needs some time to calm down.
Chandler is enjoying his time with Nina in his office until Mr.Douglas suddenly comes in.
Chandler makes up his reasons to Mr.D for not firing Nina.

description_info.description: Susan, Carol, and Ross are at the Lamaze class, watching an informational video on giving birth to a baby. Carol freaks out after watching the video. Then Susan tries to comfort her saying how the painful day would only last a day and that they would be parents for the rest of their lives. On the other hand, Ross is petrified by the reality of parenthood.
Susan, Carol, and Ross are watching a demonstrative video on giving birth to a child
Ross is scared about becoming a father

qa.answer: She trys to calm her down

Meanwhile, Joey is getting ready to go out on a date with Ursula. Pheobe stops him to ask if they have had sex yet and Joey replies to say no.

Chandler is talking about how he told Nina the truth and ended up injuring his hand. Monica is trying hard to read through the manual to fix the audio settings of the tv set back to English. Pheobe confesses why she feels worried and uneasy about Ursula and Joey going out together.

description_info.description: Pheobe is at the doorway and knocks on Joey's door to go talk to him. Ursula comes out of the house to answer her. Pheobe is surprised to find her twin sister. Meanwhile, Rachel is on the balcony trying to take down the christmas light when it is snowing heavily outside. Monica tries to get her back inside but she insists on taking them down herself. Eventually, Rachel falls off the balcony but is tangled up in Christmas light. As she is dangling from above, she knocks on Mr.Heckles' window to call for help.
Pheobe knocks on Joey's door
